name: My Spanish Coach Level 2: Intermediate
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

IMPROVE YOUR SPANISH IN A FEW MINUTES EVERY DAY!

A BASIC KNOWLEDGE OF THE SPANISH LANGUAGE IS NOT ENOUGH TO WORK IN SPAIN OR TRULY ENJOY ITS LIFE AND CULTURE. DO YOU LACK CONFIDENCE WHILST SPEAKING SPANISH? ARE YOU TIRED OF ALWAYS SEARCHING FOR THE RIGHT WORD?
  • Master Spanish vocabulary: With up to 16,800 words useable in everyday conversation, quickly reinforce your understanding of Spanish.
  • Learn and have fun: play every day to unlock challenging and entertaining games and track your progress.
  • Intermediate or fluent: My Spanish Coach will adapt its difficulty level match your skills.
